svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 483.76 156" width="483.76" height="156" style="--bg:#FFFFFF;--fg:#27272A;background:var(--bg)">
<style>
  @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap');
  @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&display=swap');
  text { font-family: 'Inter', system-ui, sans-serif; }
  .mono { font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', 'SF Mono', 'Fira Code', ui-monospace, monospace; }
  svg {
    /* Derived from --bg and --fg (overridable via --line, --accent, etc.) */
    --_text:          var(--fg);
    --_text-sec:      var(--muted, color-mix(in srgb, var(--fg) 60%, var(--bg)));
    --_text-muted:    var(--muted, color-mix(in srgb, var(--fg) 40%, var(--bg)));
    --_text-faint:    color-mix(in srgb, var(--fg) 25%, var(--bg));
    --_line:          var(--line, color-mix(in srgb, var(--fg) 30%, var(--bg)));
    --_arrow:         var(--accent, color-mix(in srgb, var(--fg) 50%, var(--bg)));
    --_node-fill:     var(--surface, color-mix(in srgb, var(--fg) 3%, var(--bg)));
    --_node-stroke:   var(--border, color-mix(in srgb, var(--fg) 20%, var(--bg)));
    --_group-fill:    var(--bg);
    --_group-hdr:     color-mix(in srgb, var(--fg) 5%, var(--bg));
    --_inner-stroke:  color-mix(in srgb, var(--fg) 12%, var(--bg));
    --_key-badge:     color-mix(in srgb, var(--fg) 10%, var(--bg));
  }
</style>
<defs>
</defs>
<polyline points="180,78 303.76,78" fill="none" stroke="var(--_line)" stroke-width="0.75" />
<rect x="40" y="51" width="140" height="54" rx="0" ry="0" fill="var(--_node-fill)" stroke="var(--_node-stroke)" stroke-width="1" />
<rect x="40" y="51" width="140" height="32" rx="0" ry="0" fill="var(--_group-hdr)" stroke="var(--_node-stroke)" stroke-width="1" />
<text x="110" y="67" text-anchor="middle" dy="0.35em" font-size="13" font-weight="700" fill="var(--_text)">PERSON</text>
<line x1="40" y1="83" x2="180" y2="83" stroke="var(--_node-stroke)" stroke-width="0.75" />
<rect x="46" y="87" width="18.439999999999998" height="14" rx="2" ry="2" fill="var(--_key-badge)" />
<text x="55.22" y="94" text-anchor="middle" dy="0.35em" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="var(--_text-sec)">PK</text>
<text x="72.44" y="94" class="mono" dy="0.35em" font-size="11" font-weight="400"><tspan fill="var(--_text-muted)">string</tspan></text>
<text x="172" y="94" class="mono" text-anchor="end" dy="0.35em" font-size="11" font-weight="400"><tspan fill="var(--_text-sec)">name</tspan></text>
<rect x="303.76" y="40" width="140" height="76" rx="0" ry="0" fill="var(--_node-fill)" stroke="var(--_node-stroke)" stroke-width="1" />
<rect x="303.76" y="40" width="140" height="32" rx="0" ry="0" fill="var(--_group-hdr)" stroke="var(--_node-stroke)" stroke-width="1" />
<text x="373.76" y="56" text-anchor="middle" dy="0.35em" font-size="13" font-weight="700" fill="var(--_text)">ADDRESS</text>
<line x1="303.76" y1="72" x2="443.76" y2="72" stroke="var(--_node-stroke)" stroke-width="0.75" />
<text x="311.76" y="83" class="mono" dy="0.35em" font-size="11" font-weight="400"><tspan fill="var(--_text-muted)">string</tspan></text>
<text x="435.76" y="83" class="mono" text-anchor="end" dy="0.35em" font-size="11" font-weight="400"><tspan fill="var(--_text-sec)">street</tspan></text>
<text x="311.76" y="105" class="mono" dy="0.35em" font-size="11" font-weight="400"><tspan fill="var(--_text-muted)">string</tspan></text>
<text x="435.76" y="105" class="mono" text-anchor="end" dy="0.35em" font-size="11" font-weight="400"><tspan fill="var(--_text-sec)">city</tspan></text>
<line x1="184" y1="72" x2="184" y2="84" stroke="var(--_line)" stroke-width="1" />
<line x1="188" y1="72" x2="188" y2="84" stroke="var(--_line)" stroke-width="1" />
<line x1="299.76" y1="85" x2="287.76" y2="78" stroke="var(--_line)" stroke-width="1" />
<line x1="299.76" y1="78" x2="287.76" y2="78" stroke="var(--_line)" stroke-width="1" />
<line x1="299.76" y1="71" x2="287.76" y2="78" stroke="var(--_line)" stroke-width="1" />
<circle cx="283.76" cy="78" r="4" fill="var(--bg)" stroke="var(--_line)" stroke-width="1" />
<rect x="215" y="69.5" width="53.760000000000005" height="17" rx="2" ry="2" fill="var(--bg)" stroke="var(--_inner-stroke)" stroke-width="0.5" />
<text x="241.88" y="78" text-anchor="middle" dy="0.35em" font-size="11" font-weight="400" fill="var(--_text-muted)">lives_at</text>
</svg>
